title: Removal of the champion "Nunu"
body:
Can we remove nunu as a champ as every game ive played with or againest a nunu, its inting or just trolling in the jg or bot lane, i know it sounds dumb but like nunu cleanse and ghost isnt in meta

Let us know what you think.

replies.body:
nunu isn't exactly bad, for some time during the locket meta, he was the highest winrate jungler, but admittedly his kit is kind of... uncoordinated. With no hard cc, 1 damaging basic ability, an ult which is at best a zoning tool and mild taunt, weird ap ratios but is best built tank, actually one of the best buffs in the game in blood boil, alot of tankiness, 'consume' an ability which makes it possible (though not advisable) to jungle without smite. Nunu is a bit of a mess.

but if nunu does get reworked, the ability I don't want to see removed has got to be blood boil. The huge ms+atkspeed steroid is very fun, offers some synergy and supportive qualities, and enables weird tanky bruiser top builds utilising builds like:
{{item:3748}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3111}} , which can push really fast and duel most fighters surprisingly well.
Nunu needs a rework, his entire kit is garbage and useless, that's why no one but trolls play him.
I mean you can't beat a good ol lvl 6 ult in bush while your passive is up and you one shot anyone at full charge that shit hella fun
He's in desperate need of a rework, his kit is equal parts boring and garbage
Well Galio was already removed for being a relic of the past and Nunu is in the same vein of champion he was in so Riot might remove him soon and replace him with a different champion called Nunu.
